grid.expression: SELECT VEN.APELIDO AS VENDEDOR, SUM(FIN.VLRDESDOB) AS VLRFATURADO, SUM(ROUND((FIN.VLRDESDOB - (CAB.VLRFRETE/(CAB.VLRNOTA/FIN.VLRDESDOB)))/100,2)) AS VLRCOMISSAO, COUNT(CAB.NUNOTA) AS QTDPEDIDOS FROM SANKHYA.TGFFIN FIN WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN SANKHYA.TGFCAB CAB WITH (NOLOCK) ON (FIN.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA) JOIN SANKHYA.TGFVEN VEN WITH (NOLOCK) ON (CAB.CODVEND = VEN.CODVEND) JOIN SANKHYA.TGFTIT TIT WITH (NOLOCK) ON (FIN.CODTIPTIT = TIT.CODTIPTIT) WHERE FIN.DHBAIXA >= :DATA_INICIAL AND FIN.DHBAIXA <= :DATA_FINAL AND VEN.CODVEND IN (46,91,131) GROUP BY VEN.APELIDO ORDER BY VEN.APELIDO
